name: Personalized Chuck Norris Jokes Widget
author: Maarten Decat

sections.description:
This plugin adds a small WordPress widget that shows a random personalized Chuck Norris joke on your blog, starring yourself.
These jokes are taken from a database on icndb.com.
For regular Chuck Norris jokes, please refer to the Chuck Norris Jokes Widget.
sections.installation:
To install this plugin:

  1. Download the plugin and extract the contents.
  2. Upload the entire plugin directory to ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Drag the “Personalized Chuck Norris Joke” widget in a widget area through the ‘Appearance – Widgets’ menu.
  5. Adjust the name of the main character in the joke or keep the default settings. Then press save and close.

You should now see a different Chuck Norris joke on your blog every time the page loads.
sections.faq: Have a question? Be sure to ask it at the plugin homepage
sections.changelog:
0.7.1

  • Fixed bug with loading jQuery.

0.7

  • Switched to client-side mashup using new jQuery plugin (no caching problems, server load minimized).

0.5

  • Branched from “Chuck Norris Joke Widget”, personalization will only be present in this plugin.

description:
This plugin adds a small WordPress widget that shows a random personalized Chuck Norris joke on your blog, starring yourself.
These jokes are taken from a database on icndb.com.
For regular Chuck Norris jokes, please refer to the Chuck Norris Jokes Widget.

upgrade_notice.0.7: Switched to a client-side mashup using new jQuery plugin. Since jokes are now fetched from the client, there are no more caching problems and server load is minimized.
upgrade_notice.0.5: Branched from "Chuck Norris Joke Widget", personalization will only be present in this plugin.
